title: Very vegetable soup
ingredients: ['1 large onion, chopped', '2 leeks, chopped', '5 carrots, chopped', '3 sticks celery, chopped', '1 large or 2 small turnips, chopped', '1 bouquet garni (thyme, bay leaves and parsley)', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 litres of stock (beef, vegetable or poultry)', 'salt and pepper to taste']
